bibl.title: Advanced Papyrological Information System (APIS): The Michigan Experience.
bibl.note: Describes the establishment of the system for scanning papyri from the collection of one of the institutions participating in APIS (the University of Michigan).

bibl.title: Special Issue on the Use of Computers in the Study of Ancient Documents

bibl.seg: GAGOS Traianos, Advanced Papyrological Information System (APIS): The Michigan Experience.
A.K. BOWMAN and Marilyn DEEGAN (Edd.), Special Issue on the Use of Computers in the Study of Ancient Documents = Literary & Linguistic Computing 12 (1997) No. 3, pp. 155-157.
Describes the establishment of the system for scanning papyri from the collection of one of the institutions participating in APIS (the University of Michigan).
